name: Dana F. BURGIN, Individually and as the Surviving Spouse of Carlton L. Burgin, Deceased, et al., petitioners, v. Raymond L. LEACH, Individually and in His Official Capacity as Deputy of the Pawnee County Sheriff's Department, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:

casebody.head_matter:
Dana F. BURGIN, Individually and as the Surviving Spouse of Carlton L. Burgin, Deceased, et al., petitioners,
v.
Raymond L. LEACH, Individually and in His Official Capacity as Deputy of the Pawnee County Sheriff's Department, et al.
No. 13-560.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 13, 2014.
Case below, 529 Fed.Appx. 882.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.
